resources.string: Hello, this is lazy clicker! Input any value you want =)
%s %s %s\n Hey there yo! My parents`ve called me %s. I`m just a poor %s years old kid. Here`s something about me yo: \n%s

%s %s %s
 Hello, my name is %s. I am %s. Trying to find new friends. Here`s some of my information: 
%s
 Thank you!

%s %s %s
 Hello everyone. I`m super old man. I`ve spent %s years on Earth. Read something about me below: 
%s
 Thanks!
Please make sure you put corresponding data (age is required)
